meanings.definition: In a manner that is becoming obsolete or outdated.
meanings.sent1: She still uses her obsolescently old flip phone.
meanings.sent2: Technology advances so quickly that devices become obsolescently within a few years.
meanings.sent3: He tried to impress his friends by dressing obsolescently, but they just laughed.
meanings.sent4: The once bustling town now stands obsolescently, frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The antique shop was filled with obsolescently charming items from the past.

meanings.definition: In a way that is no longer in common use or practice.
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith worked obsolescently, crafting tools by hand.
meanings.sent2: Writing letters by hand has become obsolescently with the rise of email.
meanings.sent3: She insisted on using her obsolescently typewriter for all her writing.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were considered obsolescently by the younger generation.
meanings.sent5: The tradition of sending postcards has become obsolescently in the digital age.
